org.apache.flex.compiler.definitions.references

Interface INamespaceReference

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    INamespaceDefinition.IAnyNamespaceDefinition, INamespaceDefinition.ICodeModelImplicitDefinitionNamespaceDefinition, INamespaceDefinition.IFilePrivateNamespaceDefinition, INamespaceDefinition.IInterfaceNamespaceDefinition, INamespaceDefinition.IInternalNamespaceDefinition, INamespaceDefinition.ILanguageNamespaceDefinition, INamespaceDefinition.INamespaceWithPackageName, INamespaceDefinition.IPrivateNamespaceDefinition, INamespaceDefinition.IProtectedNamespaceDefinition, INamespaceDefinition.IPublicNamespaceDefinition, INamespaceDefinition.IStaticProtectedNamespaceDefinition, NamespaceDefinition.IUseNamespaceDirective
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NamespaceDefinition

    public interface INamespaceReference
    INamespaceReferences are used in the symbol table to represent references to namespaces in two contexts:
    • a namespace specified on a const, var, function, and namespace definition inside a class or interface;
    • a namespace specified in a use namespace directive.

    In the first context, the INamespaceDefinition can represent a custom namespace of the form ns1, ns1::ns2, (ns1::ns2)::ns3, etc.,

      • isLanguageNamespace

        boolean isLanguageNamespace()
        Does this namespace reference refer to a builtin language namespace?
        Returns:
        true if it does.

      • resolveNamespaceReference

        INamespaceDefinition resolveNamespaceReference(ICompilerProject project)
        Resolves this namespace reference to a namespace definition.
        Parameters:
        project - ICompilerProject whose symbol table will be used to resolve references across ICompilationUnit's.
        Returns:
        The INamespaceDefinition representing the definition of the namespace.
